{polArverse} 


# devtools::install_github("politicaargentina/polArverse")

library(polArverse)
#> -- Attaching packages ------------------------------------- polArverse0.0.1.2 --

#> v legislAr  0.0.1.0       v polArViz  0.0.1.0  
#> v opinAr    0.0.1.1       v censAr    0.0.0.9  
#> v electorAr 0.0.1.0
